alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 11:43AM EDT until March 15 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Orange and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher amounts will occur at elevations above 750 ft. This is where amounts will range closer to 8 to 12 inches. This is where power outages are possible due to heavy wet snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
